summary: Request to emit warning messages when NativeConnection objects are left open after their associated Worker completes, helping users identify forgotten close() calls that prevent process shutdown.
userImpact: Users may struggle to debug why their process hangs when they forget to close NativeConnection objects, leading to frustrating debugging sessions.
proposedFix: Emit warning messages when a NativeConnection remains open for a few seconds after completion of the last associated Worker.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed, indicating the feature was likely implemented.
keyQuote: It is however too easy to forget doing so, and be left wondering why the process isn't completing as expected.
